title: mIna nayana nIvu
sahitya:
mIna nayanaa nIvu nAmIda karuNa jUDavamma


anupallavi

  bhAnu kOTi tEja nI samAna daivamu nE gAna


caraNam 1    madurA nagara nivAsini madhukaitabha  bhanjani 
vidu bimba vadana parulanu vEDanu vinumu nI vADanu
    caraNam 2    tripurAntakuni vilAsini tripurAmba suvAsini 
krpa jUDa manci samayamu gAdA nAtOnu vAdA
    caraNam 3    shruti shAstra vinutA vinumA stuti sEya nE pAtramA 
gati nIvEyani kumAruDu kOrina vADanu nI vADanu
